name: motorcyclejs-solution
description: A motorcyclejs solution to fried-list problem

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && browserify -t babelify src/app.js -o dist/app.js
scripts.start: npm install && npm run build && npm run server

author: Tylor Steinberger <tlsteinberger167@gmail.com> (github.com/TylorS)
